scenes.description: Gigi interacts with the Weapon Store Grem to get her items back.
Gigi is hungry and visits the Meat Store Grem, finding the straw hat.
Meat Store Grem gives Gigi a quest to photograph 26 giant rats.
Gigi takes photos of various "rats" in the town area.
Gigi completes the quest and receives the straw hat.
Gigi heads towards the stables to find the honkshoe.
Sewer Grem appears and talks to Gigi about her progress.
Gigi feels ignored and walks through the town.
Gigi visits the horses in the stables and retrieves the honkshoe.
Gigi celebrates gathering all three items.
Gigi returns to the sewer to give the items to Sewer Grem.

subtitles.original: Oh, is this yours? I found it down in the sewer.
subtitles.english: Oh, is this yours? I found it down in the sewer.

subtitles.original: Did I have it?
subtitles.english: Did I have it?

subtitles.original: Did I have them?
subtitles.english: Did I have them?

subtitles.original: If you want it back, throw the ring into the volcano.
subtitles.english: If you want it back, throw the ring into the volcano.

subtitles.original: Oh cool! Thanks! I'm gonna go now.
subtitles.english: Oh cool! Thanks! I'm gonna go now.

subtitles.original: That ring is truly cursed. Handle it with care, or something terrible might happen.
subtitles.english: That ring is truly cursed. Handle it with care, or something terrible might happen.

subtitles.original: If you dare throw it away, a ferocious monster will awaken...
subtitles.english: If you dare throw it away, a ferocious monster will awaken...

subtitles.original: Ooh, my tummy. I'm so hungry.
subtitles.english: Ooh, my tummy. I'm so hungry.

subtitles.original: I can't save Justice like this.
subtitles.english: I can't save Justice like this.

subtitles.original: Meat!
subtitles.english: Meat!

subtitles.original: For me?
subtitles.english: For me?

subtitles.original: For free?
subtitles.english: For free?

subtitles.original: Hey! Who told you you could eat that?!
subtitles.english: Hey! Who told you you could eat that?!

subtitles.original: Whoa, big ass hat.
subtitles.english: Whoa, big ass hat.

subtitles.original: You... You don't like my hat?
subtitles.english: You... You don't like my hat?

subtitles.original: No, no! I think your hat is lovely. I love it.
subtitles.english: No, no! I think your hat is lovely. I love it.

subtitles.original: Lovely? Really? You can eat as much meat as you want!
subtitles.english: Lovely? Really? You can eat as much meat as you want!

subtitles.original: Hey, by the way, I'm looking for a straw hat.
subtitles.english: Hey, by the way, I'm looking for a straw hat.

subtitles.original: Any idea where I could find one?
subtitles.english: Any idea where I could find one?

subtitles.original: I'll trade it if you complete my quest.
subtitles.english: I'll trade it if you complete my quest.

subtitles.original: Ah, here we go again.
subtitles.english: Ah, here we go again.

subtitles.original: I want 26 pictures of giant rats.
subtitles.english: I want 26 pictures of giant rats.

subtitles.original: Giant rats? Where do I find one of those?
subtitles.english: Giant rats? Where do I find one of those?

subtitles.original: Oh! Here they are!
subtitles.english: Oh! Here they are!

subtitles.original: Take your camera and capture family photos of all 26 of them!
subtitles.english: Take your camera and capture family photos of all 26 of them!

subtitles.original: Whoa, is this the family of 26 rats?
subtitles.english: Whoa, is this the family of 26 rats?

subtitles.original: I guess I can see why you want pictures of them.
subtitles.english: I guess I can see why you want pictures of them.

subtitles.original: Okay, it's picture time. I'll get pictures of all 26 of them.
subtitles.english: Okay, it's picture time. I'll get pictures of all 26 of them.

subtitles.original: Heh, yeah. Get in the frame. Let me get a picture of you.
subtitles.english: Heh, yeah. Get in the frame. Let me get a picture of you.

subtitles.original: One of them doesn't even look like a rat. That's a really big person.
subtitles.english: One of them doesn't even look like a rat. That's a really big person.

subtitles.original: How about down here? Oh, right, one more, one more.
subtitles.english: How about down here? Oh, right, one more, one more.

subtitles.original: That's a Grem!
subtitles.english: That's a Grem!

subtitles.original: What are you doing? You're not even a rat!
subtitles.english: What are you doing? You're not even a rat!

subtitles.original: Okay, how about down here? And look at those!
subtitles.english: Okay, how about down here? And look at those!

subtitles.original: They look just like Justice!
subtitles.english: They look just like Justice!

subtitles.original: If Justice were rats, but they're cardboard.
subtitles.english: If Justice were rats, but they're cardboard.

subtitles.original: Whoa! Okay, don't worry, I got you. I got every angle imaginable.
subtitles.english: Whoa! Okay, don't worry, I got you. I got every angle imaginable.

subtitles.original: That's a computer mouse.
subtitles.english: That's a computer mouse.

subtitles.original: And look at this photo I took, and then this one.
subtitles.english: And look at this photo I took, and then this one.

subtitles.original: And this one, it's just so cute. All these rats are so cute.
subtitles.english: And this one, it's just so cute. All these rats are so cute.

subtitles.original: And this is awesome, and this is a yummy looking rat, yay!
subtitles.english: And this is awesome, and this is a yummy looking rat, yay!

subtitles.original: How cute!! I love them!!
subtitles.english: How cute!! I love them!!

subtitles.original: Please accept this straw hat!
subtitles.english: Please accept this straw hat!

subtitles.original: A hat, for me? Yay!
subtitles.english: A hat, for me? Yay!

subtitles.original: Now I have two items!
subtitles.english: Now I have two items!

subtitles.original: Oh, the stables are over there.
subtitles.english: Oh, the stables are over there.

subtitles.original: Maybe I can get the honkshoe from the stable.
subtitles.english: Maybe I can get the honkshoe from the stable.

subtitles.original: Ah! Ah!
subtitles.english: Ah! Ah!

subtitles.original: You scared me!
subtitles.english: You scared me!

subtitles.original: How are you doing?
subtitles.english: How are you doing?

subtitles.original: Is everything going well?
subtitles.english: Is everything going well?

subtitles.original: Bad! I'm doing bad!
subtitles.english: Bad! I'm doing bad!

subtitles.original: A few more quests might cheer you up!
subtitles.english: A few more quests might cheer you up!

subtitles.original: You should take the ring to...
subtitles.english: You should take the ring to...

subtitles.original: It's like no one cares about me.
subtitles.english: It's like no one cares about me.

subtitles.original: This cruel evil world...
subtitles.english: This cruel evil world...

subtitles.original: The stables!
subtitles.english: The stables!

subtitles.original: Ah, horses. Ah, hello.
subtitles.english: Ah, horses. Ah, hello.

subtitles.original: Hi! Hi there!
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi there!

subtitles.original: Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: I can share.
subtitles.english: I can share.

subtitles.original: Here you go. Eat up.
subtitles.english: Here you go. Eat up.

subtitles.original: Is this horse okay?
subtitles.english: Is this horse okay?

subtitles.original: Oh, no, I think he's sleeping.
subtitles.english: Oh, no, I think he's sleeping.

subtitles.original: Okay, I think I can just... don't mind if I... I'll just take this.
subtitles.english: Okay, I think I can just... don't mind if I... I'll just take this.

subtitles.original: No need for this to you.
subtitles.english: No need for this to you.

subtitles.original: I've done it!
subtitles.english: I've done it!

subtitles.original: I've gathered all three items, by myself!
subtitles.english: I've gathered all three items, by myself!

subtitles.original: Yay! I am the hero of this kingdom!
subtitles.english: Yay! I am the hero of this kingdom!

subtitles.original: Sewer Grem, you probably didn't think I'd get them all.
subtitles.english: Sewer Grem, you probably didn't think I'd get them all.

subtitles.original: But I did. I got everything.
subtitles.english: But I did. I got everything.

subtitles.original: Because I am the hero.
subtitles.english: Because I am the hero.

subtitles.original: Dozo.
subtitles.english: Dozo.

subtitles.original: For you.
subtitles.english: For you.

subtitles.original: Oh wow, you really managed to get everything I asked for!
subtitles.english: Oh wow, you really managed to get everything I asked for!

subtitles.original: Hold on, wait here. There's something special just for you!
subtitles.english: Hold on, wait here. There's something special just for you!

subtitles.original: Oh yay!
subtitles.english: Oh yay!

subtitles.original: Ah man, can't believe I got everything.
subtitles.english: Ah man, can't believe I got everything.

subtitles.original: Oh, does that mean I saved Justice?
subtitles.english: Oh, does that mean I saved Justice?

subtitles.original: Oh, they're gonna be so proud of me!
subtitles.english: Oh, they're gonna be so proud of me!
